select * from tb_sys_resource t where t.disabled = 0

SELECT res.* FROM tb_usr_user u INNER JOIN tb_sys_user_role ur ON u.`id` = ur.`userId` AND ur.`disabled` = 0 INNER JOIN tb_sys_role role ON ur.`roleId` = role.`id` AND role.`disabled` = 0 INNER JOIN tb_sys_role_resource roleRes ON role.`id` = roleRes.`roleId` AND roleRes.`disabled` = 0 INNER JOIN tb_sys_resource res ON res.`id` = roleRes.`resourceId` AND res.`disabled` = 0 WHERE u.`id` = #{userId} group by res.id

SELECT t.*, CASE WHEN r.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END hasPermission FROM tb_sys_resource t LEFT JOIN tb_sys_role_resource r ON t.`id` = r.`resourceId` AND r.`disabled` = 0 AND r.`roleId` = #{roleId} WHERE t.`disabled` = 0
select * from tb_sys_permission t where t.resourceId = #{id} and t.disabled = 0
